longDescription: Healthy skin is more than surface deep. Our skin division uses polynucleotides, bio-remodellers, LED light, and medical-grade skincare to correct pigment, rebuild collagen, and lock in hydration. Whether you're targeting pigmentation, breakouts, or dullness, every plan is measured, photographed, and adjusted under Dr. Abbas’ supervision for long-term results.
